summary: A professional motorcycle and moto safety gear review website with video and cinematic content hosting, designed to impress potential sponsors and companies with high-quality presentation and content showcase capabilities
architectural_notes: Focus on professional, visually impressive design to attract sponsors
Content management system for reviews and vlogs
Replace 'vlogs' terminology with 'videos' throughout the application
Add cinematics category/section for high-quality cinematic motorcycle content
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern motorcycle-themed logo with sleek typography and motorsports aesthetic, optimized for navigation bar display (logo.dim_200x60.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a review posting form that allows users to submit new motorcycle gear reviews with all required fields including gear name, category dropdown, brand, star rating selector, review text area, and reviewer name
Implement a vlog posting form that allows users to submit new vlogs with fields for title, description, video embed URL, thumbnail URL, and category tags

Create a professional homepage that showcases featured reviews and vlogs in a visually impressive grid layout with high-quality imagery, clear typography, and smooth animations to attract sponsors and companies
Create a reviews listing page that displays all gear reviews with filtering by category, sorting by date or rating, and search functionality
Create a vlogs gallery page that displays all vlogs with embedded video players, organized in a visually appealing grid with large thumbnails and play buttons
Create individual detail pages for reviews that display full review content, high-quality gear images, star rating, specifications, and related reviews
Implement a polished navigation system with logo, main menu links (Home, Reviews, Vlogs, Submit Content), and a prominent call-to-action for sponsors

Design a high-impact visual theme with a bold, modern aesthetic using premium typography, high-contrast color palette, and professional photography styling to create an impressive, sponsor-worthy presentation
Rename all frontend references from 'Vlogs' to 'Videos' throughout the application including page titles, navigation labels, form headers, and component names
Add a category selector or filter option to the video submission form and video listing pages that allows users to specify or filter by 'Cinematics' as a distinct content type
Update the homepage featured content section to showcase both regular videos and cinematics content, maintaining the professional sponsor-worthy presentation

Create a motorcycle reviews submission form that allows users to submit new motorcycle reviews with fields for motorcycle model, manufacturer, year, star rating selector, review text area, and reviewer name
Create a motorcycle reviews listing page that displays all motorcycle reviews with search functionality, filtering options, and sorting capabilities (newest, oldest, highest rated)
Create individual detail pages for motorcycle reviews that display full review content, motorcycle specifications (model, manufacturer, year), star rating, reviewer information, and publication date
Add 'Motorcycles' navigation link to the main menu in Navigation.tsx and update routing in App.tsx to include routes for motorcycle reviews listing, submission form, and detail pages
Update the homepage (Home.tsx) to include a featured motorcycle reviews section that showcases the latest motorcycle reviews alongside existing gear reviews and videos
Redesign the site logo to be more visually attractive and modern while maintaining brand recognition for a motorcycle review platform

new_feature_requests.summary: Create motorcycle and moto safety gear review posting system
Design professional, impressive UI to attract sponsors and companies

Create a backend data model for motorcycle and moto safety gear reviews with fields for gear name, category (helmets, jackets, gloves, boots, etc.), brand, rating (1-5 stars), review text, reviewer name, and publication date
Create a backend data model for vlogs with fields for title, description, video URL (YouTube/Vimeo embed link), thumbnail URL, publication date, and category tags
Add cinematics section/option to showcase cinematic motorcycle content
Update the backend Vlog data type to support a 'cinematics' category option alongside regular video content
Add a dedicated section/page for motorcycle reviews (separate from gear reviews)
Redesign the logo to be more attractive and visually appealing

Create a new backend data model for motorcycle reviews (distinct from gear reviews) with fields for motorcycle model, manufacturer, year, rating (1-5 stars), review text, reviewer name, and publication date
